metadata.name: Flash Blind
metadata.description: 1970 England, robotics has reached such a dangerous level of intelligence they are made illegal for non-government use. Declaring themselves as real life forms, a group of machines plague the city with ruthless attacks. With the army unable to retaliate efficiently, ACID – a new special anti-terror unit are brought in. Their newest recruit Moon Yukari, a British-Japanese police officer with a tragic past, is also forced to face her present and future.
